english.segment1: I lay me down (4x). A living sacrifice to you, a living sacrifice to you
english.segment2: I lay it down, (e) (4x). A pleasing sacrifice to you, a pleasing sacrifice to you
english.segment3: I lift you up, (e) (4x). And freedom will be the song of my heart. And freedom will be the song of my heart
english.segment4: I lay me down, (e) (4x). And freedom is now the song of my heart (8x)
english.segment5: At the foot of the cross I lay my life down. At the foot of the cross I lay down my crown
english.segment6: There is freedom there OÂ’ Lord I lay my life down. Teach me Lord to deny myself. To take up your cross to deny myself. To walk with you to follow you to honor you. For the rest of my days
english.segment7: And I..and I lay my life down (whisper). And I..and I lay my life down
